data.name: CreateDashboardStagingPriority35
ReadCase
data.value: select T1.NUMB, T1.STATUS, T1.STATUS_DATE, T1.CSE_OPEN_DATE, T1.CREATED_TIMESTAMP, T1.INTERSTATE_CASE_ID, T1.NO_JURISDICTION_CD from CKT_CASE T1 with(readuncommitted) where exists ( select * from CKT_LEGAL_ACT_PERS T5 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_LEG_ACT_CAS_RL T3 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_LA_PER_LA_CROL T4 with(readuncommitted) on T3.LGA_ID = T4.LGA_ID and T3.CAS_NUMBER = T4.CAS_NUM and T3.CRO_IDENTIFIER = T4.CRO_ID and T3.CSP_NUMBER = T4.CSP_NUM and T3.CRO_TYPE = T4.CRO_TYPE on T5.LA_PERSON_ID = T4.LAP_ID and T5.ACCOUNT_TYPE = 'R' and @ladRNumber = T5.LAD_R_NUMBER and @lgaRIdentifier = T5.LGA_R_IDENTIFIER where T1.NUMB = T3.CAS_NUMBER )

data.name: ReadCaseAssignmentServiceProvider
data.value: select T1.REASON_CODE, T1.EFFECTIVE_DATE, T1.DISCONTINUE_DATE, T1.CREATED_TIMESTAMP, T1.SPD_ID, T1.OFF_ID, T1.OSP_CODE, T1.OSP_DATE, T1.CAS_NO, T2.SERVICE_PRVDER_ID, T2.USER_ID, T2.ROLE_CODE from CKT_SERVICE_PRVDER T2 join CKT_ASSIGN_CASE T1 on T1.CAS_NO = @casNo and T1.REASON_CODE = 'RSP' and T1.EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @effectiveDate and T1.DISCONTINUE_DATE >= @discontinueDate and T2.SERVICE_PRVDER_ID = T1.SPD_ID order by T1.EFFECTIVE_DATE desc

data.name: ReadCollectionObligationTypeCsePersonCollectionType
data.value: select * from ( select T1.COLL_ID, T1.APPLIED_TO_CD, T1.COLL_DT, T1.ADJ_IND, T1.CONCURRENT_IND, T1.CRT_TYPE, T1.CST_ID, T1.CRV_ID, T1.CRD_ID, T1.OBG_ID, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.OTR_ID, T1.OTR_TYPE, T1.OTY_ID, T1.COLL_ADJ_DT, T1.CREATED_TMST, T1.OB_TRN_AMT, T1.CT_ORD_APPLIED_TO, T2.DEBT_TYP_ID, T2.DEBT_TYP_CD, T2.DEBT_TYP_CLASS from CKT_OB_TYPE T2 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_COLLECTION T1 with(readuncommitted) on T2.DEBT_TYP_ID = T1.OTY_ID and T2.DEBT_TYP_CLASS <> 'R' and T1.CONCURRENT_IND = 'N' and ( T1.CREATED_TMST > @createdTmst1 and T1.CREATED_TMST < @createdTmst2 and ( T1.ADJ_IND = 'Y' and T1.COLL_ADJ_DT > @collAdjDt or T1.ADJ_IND = 'N' ) or T1.CREATED_TMST < @createdTmst1 and T1.ADJ_IND = 'Y' and (T1.COLL_ADJ_DT between cast(@date as date) and cast(@collAdjDt as date)) ) and T1.CREATED_TMST < @createdTmst2 and T1.CRT_TYPE <> 2 and T1.CRT_TYPE <> 7 and T1.COLL_ID > @collId and T1.OTR_TYPE = 'DE' and T1.CPA_TYPE = 'R' ) S1 outer apply ( select top(1) T1.COLLECTION_TYPE_ID, T1.CODE from CKT_COLLTN_TYPE T1 where exists ( select * from CKT_CR_DETAIL T2 where T1.COLLECTION_TYPE_ID = T2.CLT_IDENTIFIER and T2.CRD_ID = S1.CRD_ID and T2.CRV_IDENTIFIER = S1.CRV_ID and T2.CST_IDENTIFIER = S1.CST_ID and T2.CRT_IDENTIFIER = S1.CRT_TYPE ) ) S2 order by S1.COLL_ID

data.name: ReadCsePerson
data.value: select T1.NUMB from CKT_CSE_PERSON T1 with(readuncommitted) where exists ( select * from CKT_OB_TRN T3 with(readuncommitted) where T1.NUMB = T3.CSP_SUP_NUMBER and T3.OTY_TYPE = @otyType and T3.OB_TRN_TYP = @obTrnTyp and T3.OB_TRN_ID = @obTrnId and T3.CPA_TYPE = @cpaType and T3.CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber and T3.OBG_GENERATED_ID = @obgGeneratedId and T3.CPA_SUP_TYPE = 'S' and T3.OB_TRN_TYP = 'DE' )

data.name: ReadDashboardStagingPriority1
data.value: select REPORT_MONTH, REPORT_LEVEL, REPORT_LEVEL_ID, AS_OF_DATE, S_TYPE_COLL_AMT, S_TYPE_COLL_PER, F_TYPE_COLL_AMT, F_TYPE_COLL_PER, I_TYPE_COLL_AMT, I_TYPE_COLL_PER, U_TYPE_COLL_AMT, U_TYPE_COLL_PER, C_TYPE_COLL_AMT, C_TYPE_COLL_PER, TOTAL_COLL_AMT, CASELOAD_COUNT from CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI35 with(xlock) where REPORT_MONTH = @reportMonth and (REPORT_LEVEL in ('AT', 'CA', 'CW'))

data.name: ReadDashboardStagingPriority2
data.value: select REPORT_MONTH, REPORT_LEVEL, REPORT_LEVEL_ID, AS_OF_DATE, S_TYPE_COLL_AMT, S_TYPE_COLL_PER, F_TYPE_COLL_AMT, F_TYPE_COLL_PER, I_TYPE_COLL_AMT, I_TYPE_COLL_PER, U_TYPE_COLL_AMT, U_TYPE_COLL_PER, C_TYPE_COLL_AMT, C_TYPE_COLL_PER, TOTAL_COLL_AMT, CASELOAD_COUNT from CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI35 with(xlock) where REPORT_MONTH = @reportMonth and REPORT_LEVEL = @reportLevel and REPORT_LEVEL_ID = @reportLevelId

data.name: ReadDashboardStagingPriority3
data.value: select REPORT_MONTH, REPORT_LEVEL, REPORT_LEVEL_ID, AS_OF_DATE, S_TYPE_COLL_AMT, S_TYPE_COLL_PER, F_TYPE_COLL_AMT, F_TYPE_COLL_PER, I_TYPE_COLL_AMT, I_TYPE_COLL_PER, U_TYPE_COLL_AMT, U_TYPE_COLL_PER, C_TYPE_COLL_AMT, C_TYPE_COLL_PER, TOTAL_COLL_AMT, CASELOAD_COUNT from CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI35 with(xlock) where REPORT_MONTH = @reportMonth and (REPORT_LEVEL in ('AT', 'CW'))

data.name: ReadLegalAction
data.value: select T1.LEGAL_ACTION_ID, T1.STANDARD_NO, T1.TRB_ID from CKT_LEGAL_ACTION T1 where cast(@otrType as char(2)) = 'DE' and exists ( select * from CKT_OBLIGATION T3 where T1.LEGAL_ACTION_ID = T3.LGA_IDENTIFIER and T3.LAD_NUMBER is not null and T3.DTY_GENERATED_ID = @dtyGeneratedId and T3.OB_ID = @obId and T3.CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber and T3.CPA_TYPE = @cpaType )

data.name: ReadLegalActionDetail
data.value: select T1.LGA_IDENTIFIER, T1.LA_DETAIL_NO, T1.DETAIL_TYPE from CKT_LEGAL_ACT_DTL T1 with(readuncommitted) where cast(@otrType as char(2)) = 'DE' and exists ( select * from CKT_OBLIGATION T2 with(readuncommitted) where T1.LA_DETAIL_NO = T2.LAD_NUMBER and T1.LGA_IDENTIFIER = T2.LGA_IDENTIFIER and T2.DTY_GENERATED_ID = @dtyGeneratedId and T2.OB_ID = @obId and T2.CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber and T2.CPA_TYPE = @cpaType )

data.name: ReadLegalActionLegalActionAssigmentServiceProvider
data.value: select T1.LEGAL_ACTION_ID, T1.STANDARD_NO, T1.TRB_ID, T2.OSP_EFFECTIVE_DATE, T2.OSP_ROLE_CODE, T2.OFF_GENERATED_ID, T2.SPD_GENERATED_ID, T2.EFFECTIVE_DT, T2.END_DT, T2.CREATED_TIMESTAMP, T3.SERVICE_PRVDER_ID, T3.USER_ID, T3.ROLE_CODE from CKT_SERVICE_PRVDER T3 join CKT_LEGAL_ACTION T1 join CKT_LA_SERV_PROV T2 on T1.STANDARD_NO = @standardNo and T1.LEGAL_ACTION_ID = T2.LGA_IDENTIFIER and T2.EFFECTIVE_DT <= @effectiveDt and T2.END_DT >= @endDt and T2.OSP_ROLE_CODE is not null and T2.OSP_EFFECTIVE_DATE is not null and T2.OFF_GENERATED_ID is not null on T3.SERVICE_PRVDER_ID = T2.SPD_GENERATED_ID order by T2.EFFECTIVE_DT desc

data.name: UpdateDashboardStagingPriority1
data.value: update CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI35 set S_TYPE_COLL_AMT = @STypeCollAmt, S_TYPE_COLL_PER = @STypeCollPer, F_TYPE_COLL_AMT = @FTypeCollAmt, F_TYPE_COLL_PER = @FTypeCollPer, I_TYPE_COLL_AMT = @ITypeCollAmt, I_TYPE_COLL_PER = @ITypeCollPer, U_TYPE_COLL_AMT = @UTypeCollAmt, U_TYPE_COLL_PER = @UTypeCollPer, C_TYPE_COLL_AMT = @CTypeCollAmt, C_TYPE_COLL_PER = @CTypeCollPer, TOTAL_COLL_AMT = @totalCollAmt where REPORT_MONTH = @reportMonth and REPORT_LEVEL = @reportLevel and REPORT_LEVEL_ID = @reportLevelId

data.name: UpdateDashboardStagingPriority2
data.value: update CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI35 set AS_OF_DATE = @asOfDate, S_TYPE_COLL_AMT = @STypeCollAmt, F_TYPE_COLL_AMT = @FTypeCollAmt, I_TYPE_COLL_AMT = @ITypeCollAmt, U_TYPE_COLL_AMT = @UTypeCollAmt, C_TYPE_COLL_AMT = @CTypeCollAmt, TOTAL_COLL_AMT = @totalCollAmt where REPORT_MONTH = @reportMonth and REPORT_LEVEL = @reportLevel and REPORT_LEVEL_ID = @reportLevelId

data.name: UpdateDashboardStagingPriority3
data.value: update CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI35 set S_TYPE_COLL_PER = @STypeCollPer, F_TYPE_COLL_PER = @FTypeCollPer, I_TYPE_COLL_PER = @ITypeCollPer, U_TYPE_COLL_PER = @UTypeCollPer, C_TYPE_COLL_PER = @CTypeCollPer where REPORT_MONTH = @reportMonth and REPORT_LEVEL = @reportLevel and REPORT_LEVEL_ID = @reportLevelId
